post.body: Ha! Sounds like a fun game of Risk.
You think? I can't stand gmail or facebook chat. I have those things open in another browser tab and never see them. IM FTW!
Well, if you want a quick 'n' dirty solution, yeah, put it in the Windows dir. If not that, why not just modify your path?
(Link from @ronsims, believe it or not!) #seatst Apparently 'let it thaw' is Seattle's snow cleanup plan as well: http://bit.ly/16QpF
RT @codinghorror: porn : video :: gambling : math
Earning ~$1/wk via Google AdSense on Project Unblowuppable with ~10 private beta users (~5 regular). 5000 users = $1000/wk just from ads!
Planning to replace projector with a flatscreen to cut cable clutter across the ceiling. Criteria: >= 50", 1080p, < $999. Getting there!
This is cool, wireless HDMI! But crazy expensive at $1499: http://bit.ly/xdkH
RT @financialpost Edmonton biotech firm may be key to multiple sclerosis breakthrough http://tinyurl.com/6se3gt
'75% of population glad Bush is done.' Guess there are slightly fewer idiots in America than there were 4 yrs ago when they re-elected him.
Just made a donation to Wikipedia. Well worth it--it's something I use almost every day. Do you? http://bit.ly/JYHm
Shannon got the whole driveway(!) shoveled this morning while I was in bed with The Plague. Now it's snowing hard again (Ames Lake). #seatst
Dropped off hawk to the rescue director. Said it was probably a female redtail subspecies. Looked ok, but pale and thin. Can't hunt in snow?
On our way to Monroe to deliver the injured hawk to the rescue ppl. 203 clear but a little icy. Can I haz home soon pls? #seatst
Cats still have no idea there's a hawk in the bathroom. I'd expected them to smell it and be pacing in front of the door by now.
Note to self: Don't play Monopoly with the in-laws. Whether they win or lose it's bad news. :)
We have our hawk friend in the bathroom, and he climbed out from under the blanket we had over him. Still waiting to hear from the rescue.
Rescued an injured hawk by the side of the road in Carnation! Taking bird home til we can get to a rescue. #seatst http://snipurl.com/948ao
Braving heading out to look in on neighbors' cats and head to Full Circle Farm in Carnation. Deep snow but no problems yet! #seatst
Done opening xmas gifts, roast beast in the crockpot, and about to play some Monopoly while we're snowed in. STILL snowing. Merry Christmas!
